variables.input:
fetch events
| filter event.kind == "SECURITY_EVENT"
| filter event.category == "VULNERABILITY_MANAGEMENT"
| filter event.provider == "Dynatrace"
| filter event.type == "VULNERABILITY_STATE_REPORT_EVENT" | filter event.level == "ENTITY" | summarize takeLast(vulnerability.id), by: vulnerability.stack | fields values = vulnerability.stack

fetch events
| filter event.kind == "SECURITY_EVENT"
| filter event.category == "VULNERABILITY_MANAGEMENT"
| filter event.provider == "Dynatrace"
| filter event.type == "VULNERABILITY_STATE_REPORT_EVENT" | filter event.level == "ENTITY" | summarize takeLast(vulnerability.id), by: vulnerability.parent.risk.level | fields values = vulnerability.parent.risk.level

0.query:
fetch events
| filter dt.system.bucket=="default_security_events" // only security events
| filter event.provider=="Dynatrace" // only events generated by dynatrace
| filter event.type=="VULNERABILITY_STATE_REPORT_EVENT" // historical vulnerability data
| filter event.level=="ENTITY" // on entity level
// filter only the latest snapshot data
| dedup {vulnerability.id,affected_entity.id}, sort: { timestamp desc }
// end of filtering for the latest snapshot
| filter vulnerability.parent.resolution.status == $Status OR "All" == $Status
| filter vulnerability.parent.mute.status == $MuteStatus OR "All" == $MuteStatus
| filter in(vulnerability.stack,$StackLevel)
| filter in(vulnerability.parent.risk.level,$RiskLevel)
| summarize total=arraySize(arrayRemoveNulls(collectDistinct(vulnerability.id)))
| fields `Total vulnerabilities` = if(isNull(total), 0, else:total)

1.content:
# Third-party vulnerabilities exposure report

Track and report your organization's exposure to third-party vulnerabilities.

#### Use this template to answer the following security questions:

* Is your organization exposed to threat-related vulnerabilities?
* What areas of your environment are at risk?
* How has the exposure changed over time?

*Note: Dashboard contents are calculated and displayed according to set [variable values](https://www.dynatrace.com/support/help/observe-and-explore/dashboards-new/get-started/dashboards-use#dashboard-variable-set).*

3.query:
fetch events
| filter dt.system.bucket=="default_security_events" // only security events
| filter event.provider=="Dynatrace" // only events generated by dynatrace
| filter event.type=="VULNERABILITY_STATE_REPORT_EVENT" // historical vulnerability data
| filter event.level=="ENTITY" // on entity level
// filter only the latest snapshot data
| dedup {vulnerability.id,affected_entity.id}, sort: { timestamp desc }
// end of filtering for the latest snapshot
| filter vulnerability.parent.resolution.status == $Status OR "All" == $Status
| filter vulnerability.parent.mute.status == $MuteStatus OR "All" == $MuteStatus
| filter in(vulnerability.stack,$StackLevel)
| filter in(vulnerability.parent.risk.level,$RiskLevel)
| limit 1
| fields
`Last analyzed data`=formatTimestamp(timestamp, format:"YYYY-MM-dd")

4.content:
## üí• Exposure summary
---
Your environment's exposure to vulnerabilities, the affected or related entities, and the exploitation risk.

10.title: Related applications
10.query:
fetch events
| filter dt.system.bucket=="default_security_events" // only security events
| filter event.provider=="Dynatrace" // only events generated by dynatrace
| filter event.type=="VULNERABILITY_STATE_REPORT_EVENT" // historical vulnerability data
| filter event.level=="ENTITY" // on entity level
| filter vulnerability.parent.resolution.status == $Status OR "All" == $Status
| filter vulnerability.parent.mute.status == $MuteStatus OR "All" == $MuteStatus
| filter in(vulnerability.stack,$StackLevel)
| filter in(vulnerability.parent.risk.level,$RiskLevel)
// only consider open, not muted entities
| filter vulnerability.resolution.status == "OPEN"
| filter vulnerability.mute.status == "NOT_MUTED"
// flatten arrays for deduplication
| expand entities=related_entities.applications.ids
// count grouped, deduplicated values
| summarize entities=arraySize(arrayRemoveNulls(collectDistinct(entities))), by:{timestamp=bin(timestamp, 1h)}
// put timestamp in the right order
| sort timestamp, direction:"ascending"
| summarize entities=takeLast(entities)
| fields `Related applications`=if(entities>0, entities,  else:"-")

11.title: Exploitation Risk Score (0-100)

12.title: Open
12.query:
fetch events
| filter dt.system.bucket=="default_security_events" // only security events
| filter event.provider=="Dynatrace" // only events generated by dynatrace
| filter event.type=="VULNERABILITY_STATE_REPORT_EVENT" // historical vulnerability data
| filter event.level=="ENTITY" // on entity level
// filter only the latest snapshot data
| dedup {vulnerability.id,affected_entity.id}, sort: { timestamp desc }
// end of filtering for the latest snapshot
| filter vulnerability.parent.resolution.status == $Status OR "All" == $Status
| filter vulnerability.parent.mute.status == $MuteStatus OR "All" == $MuteStatus
| filter in(vulnerability.stack,$StackLevel)
| filter in(vulnerability.parent.risk.level,$RiskLevel)

| sort timestamp, direction:"descending"
| summarize {
  OpenEntities=countIf(vulnerability.resolution.status=="OPEN" AND vulnerability.mute.status=="NOT_MUTED"),
  ResolvedEntities=countIf(vulnerability.resolution.status=="RESOLVED" AND vulnerability.mute.status=="NOT_MUTED"),
  MutedEntities=countIf(vulnerability.mute.status=="MUTED"),
  ResolutionStatus=takeFirst(vulnerability.parent.resolution.status),
  MuteStatus=takeFirst(vulnerability.parent.mute.status)
}, by: {vulnerability.id}
| fieldsAdd
  Status=if((OpenEntities==0 AND ResolvedEntities==0 AND MutedEntities>0) OR MuteStatus=="MUTED","MUTED",
               else:if((OpenEntities==0 AND ResolvedEntities>0) OR ResolutionStatus=="RESOLVED","RESOLVED",
               else:"OPEN"))
| summarize
  Open=countIf(Status=="OPEN")
| fields Open=if(Open>0,Open,else:"-")

13.title: Resolved
13.query:

| filter dt.system.bucket=="default_security_events" // only security events
| filter event.provider=="Dynatrace" // only events generated by dynatrace

| dedup {vulnerability.id,affected_entity.id}, sort: { timestamp desc }
// end of filtering for the latest snapshot
| filter vulnerability.parent.resolution.status == $Status OR "All" == $Status
| filter vulnerability.parent.mute.status == $MuteStatus OR "All" == $MuteStatus
| filter in(vulnerability.stack,$StackLevel)
| filter in(vulnerability.parent.risk.level,$RiskLevel)

| summarize {
    OpenEntities=countIf(vulnerability.resolution.status=="OPEN" AND vulnerability.mute.status=="NOT_MUTED"),
    ResolvedEntities=countIf(vulnerability.resolution.status=="RESOLVED" AND vulnerability.mute.status=="NOT_MUTED"),
    MutedEntities=countIf(vulnerability.mute.status=="MUTED"),
    ResolutionStatus=takeFirst(vulnerability.parent.resolution.status),
    MuteStatus=takeFirst(vulnerability.parent.mute.status)
}, by: {vulnerability.id}
| fieldsAdd
Status=if((OpenEntities==0 AND ResolvedEntities==0 AND MutedEntities>0) OR MuteStatus=="MUTED","MUTED",
             else:if((OpenEntities==0 AND ResolvedEntities>0) OR ResolutionStatus=="RESOLVED","RESOLVED",
             else:"OPEN"))
| summarize
`Muted`=countIf(Status=="MUTED"),
`Resolved`=countIf(Status=="RESOLVED"),
`Open`=countIf(Status=="OPEN")
| fields Resolved=if(Resolved>0,Resolved,else:"-")

20.content: __Exploitation Risk Score (ERS)__ is a dynamic, weighted score that leverages the Davis Security Score (DSS) of each vulnerability and the actual number of vulnerabilities per risk level. ERS represents the likelihood of a potential attacker exploiting open vulnerabilities from the filtered scope. How ERS is calculated: 1. DSS average and vulnerability counts are calculated per risk level (critical, high, etc.). 2. A weighted function is applied per risk level to adjust the averages to the respective vulnerability counts. 3. All scores are aggregated in an iterative manner starting with the highest risk level to derive a single score out of 100. __Note__: Higher scores represent higher risk. Scores above 90 involve critical vulnerabilities.

27.content:
## üìà Risk analysis
---
Vulnerability counts and trends based on Davis risk level assessment. __Note__: _Change_ marks changes occurred within the set timeframe.

30.title: Critical
30.query:
fetch events
| filter dt.system.bucket=="default_security_events" // only security events
| filter event.provider=="Dynatrace" // only events generated by dynatrace
| filter event.type=="VULNERABILITY_STATE_REPORT_EVENT" // historical vulnerability data
| filter event.level=="ENTITY" // on entity level
// filter only the latest snapshot data
| dedup {vulnerability.id,affected_entity.id}, sort: { timestamp desc }
// end of filtering for the latest snapshot
| filter vulnerability.parent.resolution.status == $Status OR "All" == $Status
| filter vulnerability.parent.mute.status == $MuteStatus OR "All" == $MuteStatus
| filter in(vulnerability.stack,$StackLevel)
| filter in(vulnerability.parent.risk.level,$RiskLevel)
| filter vulnerability.resolution.status == "OPEN"
| filter vulnerability.mute.status == "NOT_MUTED"
| summarize
{
  Critical=countIf(vulnerability.risk.level=="CRITICAL")
}, by: {vulnerability.id}
| summarize
  Critical=countIf(Critical>0)
| fields Critical=if(Critical>0,Critical,else:"-")

31.title: Change
31.query:
fetch events
| filter dt.system.bucket=="default_security_events" // only security events
| filter event.provider=="Dynatrace" // only events generated by dynatrace
| filter event.type=="VULNERABILITY_STATE_REPORT_EVENT" // historical vulnerability data
| filter event.level=="ENTITY" // on entity level
| filter vulnerability.parent.resolution.status == $Status OR "All" == $Status
| filter vulnerability.parent.mute.status == $MuteStatus OR "All" == $MuteStatus
| filter in(vulnerability.stack,$StackLevel)
| filter in(vulnerability.parent.risk.level,$RiskLevel)

| filter vulnerability.resolution.status == "OPEN"
| filter vulnerability.mute.status == "NOT_MUTED"
| summarize
{
  Vulnerabilities=countIf(vulnerability.risk.level=="CRITICAL")
}, by: { {bin(timestamp,1h),alias:timestamp}, vulnerability.id}
| summarize
{
  Vulnerabilities=countIf(Vulnerabilities>0)},
  by: {timestamp}
| sort timestamp, direction:"descending"
| summarize start = takeLast(Vulnerabilities), end = takeFirst(Vulnerabilities)
| fields delta=end-start
| fields `Critical delta`=if(delta>0,concat(delta,"‚ÜóÔ∏è"),else:if(delta<0,concat(delta,"‚ÜòÔ∏è"),else:"-"))

32.title: Vulnerability count by risk level
32.query:
fetch events
| filter dt.system.bucket=="default_security_events" // only security events
| filter event.provider=="Dynatrace" // only events generated by dynatrace
| filter event.type=="VULNERABILITY_STATE_REPORT_EVENT" // historical vulnerability data
| filter event.level=="ENTITY" // on entity level
| filter vulnerability.parent.resolution.status == $Status OR "All" == $Status
| filter vulnerability.parent.mute.status == $MuteStatus OR "All" == $MuteStatus
| filter in(vulnerability.stack,$StackLevel)
| filter in(vulnerability.parent.risk.level,$RiskLevel)
| filter vulnerability.resolution.status == "OPEN"
| filter vulnerability.mute.status == "NOT_MUTED"
| summarize
{
  Critical=countIf(vulnerability.risk.level=="CRITICAL"),
    High=countIf(vulnerability.risk.level=="HIGH"),
    Medium=countIf(vulnerability.risk.level=="MEDIUM"),
    Low=countIf(vulnerability.risk.level=="LOW")
}, by: { bin(timestamp,1h),alias:timestamp, vulnerability.display_id}
| summarize
Low=countIf(Critical==0 AND High==0 AND Medium==0 AND Low>0),
Medium=countIf(Critical==0 AND High==0 AND Medium>0),
High=countIf(Critical==0 AND High>0),
Critical=countIf(Critical>0),
  by: {timestamp}
| sort timestamp, direction:"descending"

52.title: Vulnerability count by status
52.query:
fetch events
| filter dt.system.bucket=="default_security_events" // only security events
| filter event.provider=="Dynatrace" // only events generated by dynatrace
| filter event.type=="VULNERABILITY_STATE_REPORT_EVENT" // historical vulnerability data
| filter event.level=="ENTITY" // on entity level
| filter vulnerability.parent.resolution.status == $Status OR "All" == $Status
| filter vulnerability.parent.mute.status == $MuteStatus OR "All" == $MuteStatus
| filter in(vulnerability.stack,$StackLevel)
| filter in(vulnerability.parent.risk.level,$RiskLevel)

| sort timestamp, direction:"descending"
| summarize {
OpenEntities=countIf(vulnerability.resolution.status=="OPEN" AND vulnerability.mute.status=="NOT_MUTED"),
ResolvedEntities=countIf(vulnerability.resolution.status=="RESOLVED" AND vulnerability.mute.status=="NOT_MUTED"),
MutedEntities=countIf(vulnerability.mute.status=="MUTED"),
ResolutionStatus=takeFirst(vulnerability.parent.resolution.status),
MuteStatus=takeFirst(vulnerability.parent.mute.status)
}, by: {vulnerability.display_id, bin(timestamp,1h),alias:timestamp}
| fieldsAdd
Status=if((OpenEntities==0 AND ResolvedEntities==0 AND MutedEntities>0) OR MuteStatus=="MUTED","MUTED",
             else:if((OpenEntities==0 AND ResolvedEntities>0) OR ResolutionStatus=="RESOLVED","RESOLVED",
             else:"OPEN"))
| summarize
Open=countIf(Status=="OPEN"),
Muted=countIf(Status=="MUTED"),
by: {timestamp}
| sort timestamp, direction:"descending"

| filter event.level=="ENTITY" // on entity level
// filter only the latest snapshot data
| dedup {vulnerability.id,affected_entity.id}, sort: { timestamp desc }
// end of filtering for the latest snapshot
| filter vulnerability.parent.resolution.status == $Status OR "All" == $Status
| filter vulnerability.parent.mute.status == $MuteStatus OR "All" == $MuteStatus
| filter in(vulnerability.stack,$StackLevel)
| filter in(vulnerability.parent.risk.level,$RiskLevel)

| sort timestamp, direction:"descending"
| summarize
{vulnerability.type=takeFirst(vulnerability.type)},
by: {vulnerability.id}
| summarize
vulnerabilities=count(), by:{vulnerability.type}
| sort vulnerabilities,direction:"descending"
|limit 5

63.title: Vulnerabilities (sorted by status, risk, Davis assessment)
63.query:
fetch events
| filter dt.system.bucket=="default_security_events" // only security events
| filter event.provider=="Dynatrace" // only events generated by dynatrace
| filter event.type=="VULNERABILITY_STATE_REPORT_EVENT" // historical vulnerability data
| filter event.level=="ENTITY" // on entity level
// filter only the latest snapshot data
| dedup {vulnerability.id,affected_entity.id}, sort: { timestamp desc }
// end of filtering for the latest snapshot
| filter vulnerability.parent.resolution.status == $Status OR "All" == $Status
| filter vulnerability.parent.mute.status == $MuteStatus OR "All" == $MuteStatus
| filter in(vulnerability.stack,$StackLevel)
| filter in(vulnerability.parent.risk.level,$RiskLevel)

// now summarize on the vulnerability level
| summarize
{
  vulnerability.parent.first_seen=takeFirst(vulnerability.parent.first_seen),
  vulnerability.parent.resolution.status=takeFirst(vulnerability.parent.resolution.status),
  vulnerability.parent.mute.status=takeFirst(vulnerability.parent.mute.status),
  vulnerability.title=takeFirst(vulnerability.title),
  vulnerability.references.cve=takeFirst(vulnerability.references.cve),
  riskLevels=collectDistinct(if(vulnerability.mute.status == "NOT_MUTED" AND vulnerability.resolution.status == "OPEN", vulnerability.risk.level, else: null)),
  vulnerability.risk.score=round(takeMax(if(vulnerability.mute.status == "NOT_MUTED" AND vulnerability.resolution.status == "OPEN", vulnerability.risk.score, else:0)),decimals:1),
  affectedEntities=arraySize(collectDistinct(affected_entity.id)),
  nonMutedEntities=countIf(vulnerability.mute.status=="NOT_MUTED"),
  functionsInUse=countIf(vulnerability.davis_assessment.vulnerable_function_status=="IN_USE" AND
    vulnerability.mute.status == "NOT_MUTED" AND
    vulnerability.resolution.status == "OPEN"
  ),
  functionsNotAvailable=countIf(vulnerability.davis_assessment.vulnerable_function_status=="NOT_AVAILABLE" AND
  vulnerability.mute.status == "NOT_MUTED" AND
  vulnerability.resolution.status == "OPEN"
  ),
  exposurePublicNetwork=countIf(vulnerability.davis_assessment.exposure_status=="PUBLIC_NETWORK" AND
  vulnerability.mute.status == "NOT_MUTED" AND
  vulnerability.resolution.status == "OPEN"
  ),
  exposureNotAvailable=countIf(vulnerability.davis_assessment.exposure_status=="NOT_AVAILABLE" AND
  vulnerability.mute.status == "NOT_MUTED" AND
  vulnerability.resolution.status == "OPEN"
  ),
  exploitAvailable=countIf(vulnerability.davis_assessment.exploit_status=="AVAILABLE" AND
  vulnerability.mute.status == "NOT_MUTED" AND
  vulnerability.resolution.status == "OPEN"
  ),
  reachableDataAssets=countIf(vulnerability.davis_assessment.data_assets_status=="REACHABLE" AND
  vulnerability.mute.status == "NOT_MUTED" AND
  vulnerability.resolution.status == "OPEN"
  ),
  reachableDataAssetsNotAvailable=countIf(vulnerability.davis_assessment.data_assets_status=="NOT_AVAILABLE" AND
  vulnerability.mute.status == "NOT_MUTED" AND
  vulnerability.resolution.status == "OPEN"
  )
},
by: {vulnerability.display_id}
| fieldsAdd
  vulnerability.risk.level=if(in("CRITICAL", riskLevels),"CRITICAL",
                                     else:if(in("HIGH", riskLevels),"HIGH",
                                     else:if(in("MEDIUM", riskLevels),"MEDIUM",
                                     else:"LOW"))),
   status=if(vulnerability.parent.resolution.status=="RESOLVED","RESOLVED",
   else:if(nonMutedEntities==0 OR vulnerability.parent.mute.status=="MUTED", "MUTED",
   else:"OPEN"))
| fields
  vulnerability.display_id,
  Title=vulnerability.title,
  CVE=if(arraySize(vulnerability.references.cve)>0,vulnerability.references.cve,else:"-"),
  Status=if(status=="RESOLVED","‚úÖ Resolved", else:if(status=="MUTED", "‚ö´ Muted (OPEN)", else:"üî¥ Open")),
  DSS=concat(vulnerability.risk.level," (",vulnerability.risk.score,")"),
  vulnerability.risk.score,
  status_sort=if(status=="RESOLVED",3,else:if(status=="MUTED",2,else:1)),
  vulnerability.parent.first_seen,
`# Function in use` = functionsInUse,
`# Affected entities` = affectedEntities,
`Vulnerable functions`=if(functionsInUse>0,concat("‚ùó","In use"),else:if(functionsNotAvailable>0,"Not available",else:"Not in use")),
`# Exposure to internet` = exposurePublicNetwork,
`Public internet exposure`=if(exposurePublicNetwork>0,concat("‚ùó","Public network"),else:if(exposureNotAvailable>0,"Not available",else:"Not detected")),
`# Exploit published` = exploitAvailable,
`Public exploit`=if(exploitAvailable>0,concat("‚ùó","Published"),else:"None published"),
`# Reachable databases` = reachableDataAssets,
`Reachable data assets`=if(reachableDataAssets>0,concat("‚ùó","Within range"),else:if(reachableDataAssetsNotAvailable>0,"Not available", else:"None within range"))
| sort   status_sort, {vulnerability.risk.score, direction:"descending"}, {`# Function in use`, direction:"descending"},
{`# Exposure to internet`, direction:"descending"}, {`# Exploit published`, direction:"descending"},
{`# Reachable databases`, direction:"descending"}, {`# Affected entities`,direction:"descending"}, {vulnerability.parent.first_seen,direction:"descending"}
| fieldsRemove status_sort, vulnerability.risk.score, vulnerability.parent.first_seen, `# Function in use`,`# Reachable databases`,`# Exposure to internet`,`# Exploit published`, `# Affected entities`

64.content:
## üéØ Environment analysis
---
In-depth examination of affected entities and related entities in your environment in the context of the selected vulnerabilities. __Note__: _Change_ marks changes occurred within the set timeframe.

75.title: Top 10 affected entities by Davis assessment
75.query:
fetch events
| filter dt.system.bucket=="default_security_events" // only security events
| filter event.provider=="Dynatrace" // only events generated by dynatrace
| filter event.type=="VULNERABILITY_STATE_REPORT_EVENT" // historical vulnerability data
| filter event.level=="ENTITY" // on entity level
// filter only the latest snapshot data
| dedup {vulnerability.id,affected_entity.id}, sort: { timestamp desc }
// end of filtering for the latest snapshot
| filter vulnerability.parent.resolution.status == $Status OR "All" == $Status
| filter vulnerability.parent.mute.status == $MuteStatus OR "All" == $MuteStatus
| filter in(vulnerability.stack,$StackLevel)
| filter in(vulnerability.parent.risk.level,$RiskLevel)
| summarize
affected_entity.name=takeFirst(affected_entity.name),
affected_entity.type=takeFirst(affected_entity.type),
vulnerability.risk.score=round(takeMax(vulnerability.risk.score),decimals:1),
Critical=countIf(vulnerability.risk.level=="CRITICAL"),
High=countIf(vulnerability.risk.level=="HIGH"),
Medium=countIf(vulnerability.risk.level=="MEDIUM"),
Low=countIf(vulnerability.risk.level=="LOW"),
`# OPEN`=countIf(vulnerability.resolution.status=="OPEN"),
`# RESOLVED`=countIf(vulnerability.resolution.status=="RESOLVED"),
`# NOT-MUTED`=countIf(vulnerability.mute.status=="NOT_MUTED"),
`# NOT-MUTED parents`=countIf(vulnerability.parent.mute.status=="NOT_MUTED"),
`# Function in use`=countIf(
  vulnerability.davis_assessment.vulnerable_function_status=="IN_USE" AND
  vulnerability.mute.status == "NOT_MUTED" AND
  vulnerability.resolution.status == "OPEN"
),
`# Function no data`=countIf(
  vulnerability.davis_assessment.vulnerable_function_status=="NOT_AVAILABLE" AND
  vulnerability.mute.status == "NOT_MUTED" AND
  vulnerability.resolution.status == "OPEN"
),
`# Exposure to internet`=countIf(
  vulnerability.davis_assessment.exposure_status=="PUBLIC_NETWORK" AND
  vulnerability.mute.status == "NOT_MUTED" AND
  vulnerability.resolution.status == "OPEN"
),
`# Exposure no data`=countIf(vulnerability.davis_assessment.exposure_status=="NOT_AVAILABLE" AND
  vulnerability.mute.status == "NOT_MUTED" AND
  vulnerability.resolution.status == "OPEN"
),
`# Exploit published`=countIf(vulnerability.davis_assessment.exploit_status=="AVAILABLE" AND
  vulnerability.mute.status == "NOT_MUTED" AND
  vulnerability.resolution.status == "OPEN"
),
`# Reachable databases`=countIf(vulnerability.davis_assessment.data_assets_status=="REACHABLE" AND
  vulnerability.mute.status == "NOT_MUTED" AND
  vulnerability.resolution.status == "OPEN"
),
dt.entity.process_group=takeFirst(dt.entity.process_group),
dt.entity.host=takeFirst(dt.entity.host),
dt.entity.kubernetes_node=takeFirst(dt.entity.kubernetes_node),
by: {affected_entity.id}
| fieldsAdd
vulnerability.resolution.status=if(`# OPEN`>0,"AFFECTED",else:"RESOLVED"),
vulnerability.mute.status=if(`# NOT-MUTED`==0 OR `# NOT-MUTED parents`==0,"MUTED",else:"NOT_MUTED"),
vulnerability.risk.level=if(Critical>0,"CRITICAL",
                                     else:if(High>0,"HIGH",
                                     else:if(Medium>0,"MEDIUM",
                                     else:"LOW")))
| fields
dt.source_entity=affected_entity.id,
Name=affected_entity.name,
Type=affected_entity.type,
status_sort=if(vulnerability.resolution.status=="RESOLVED",3,else:if( vulnerability.mute.status=="MUTED",2,else:1)),
Status=if(vulnerability.mute.status=="MUTED",concat("‚ö´"," Muted (",vulnerability.resolution.status,")"),
       else:if(`# OPEN`==0, concat("‚úÖ","Resolved"),
            else:concat("üî¥"," Affected"))),
`# Function in use`,
`Vulnerable functions`=if(`# Function in use`>0,concat("‚ùó","In use"),else:if(`# Function no data`>0,"Not available",else:"Not in use")),
`# Exposure to internet`,
`Public internet exposure`=if(`# Exposure to internet`>0,concat("‚ùó","Public network"),else:if(`# Exposure no data`>0,"Not available",else:"Not detected")),
`# Exploit published`,
`Public exploit`=if(`# Exploit published`>0,concat("‚ùó","Published"),else:"None published"),
`# Reachable databases`,
`Reachable data assets`=if(`# Reachable databases`>0,concat("‚ùó","Within range"), else:"None within range"),
vulnerability.risk.score,
dt.entity.process_group=dt.entity.process_group,
dt.entity.host=dt.entity.host,
dt.entity.kubernetes_node=dt.entity.kubernetes_node
| sort   status_sort, {vulnerability.risk.score, direction:"descending"}, {`# Function in use`, direction:"descending"},
{`# Exposure to internet`, direction:"descending"}, {`# Exploit published`, direction:"descending"},
{`# Reachable databases`, direction:"descending"}
| fieldsRemove status_sort, vulnerability.risk.score, `# Function in use`,`# Reachable databases`,`# Exposure to internet`,`# Exploit published`
| limit 10

76.content:
### Related entities
Entities that are connected to one of the affected entities, thus indirectly affected by the vulnerability.

77.title: Applications
77.query:
fetch events
| filter dt.system.bucket=="default_security_events" // only security events
| filter event.provider=="Dynatrace" // only events generated by dynatrace
| filter event.type=="VULNERABILITY_STATE_REPORT_EVENT" // historical vulnerability data
| filter event.level=="ENTITY" // on entity level
| filter vulnerability.parent.resolution.status == $Status OR "All" == $Status
| filter vulnerability.parent.mute.status == $MuteStatus OR "All" == $MuteStatus
| filter in(vulnerability.stack,$StackLevel)
| filter in(vulnerability.parent.risk.level,$RiskLevel)
// only consider open, not muted entities
| filter vulnerability.resolution.status == "OPEN"
| filter vulnerability.mute.status == "NOT_MUTED"
// flatten arrays for deduplication
| expand entities=related_entities.applications.ids
// count grouped, deduplicated values
| summarize entities=arraySize(arrayRemoveNulls(collectDistinct(entities))), by:{timestamp=bin(timestamp, 1h)}
// put timestamp in the right order
| sort timestamp, direction:"ascending"
| summarize entities=takeLast(entities)
| fields `Applications`=if(entities>0, entities,  else:"-")

95.content:
## üìÉ Code analysis
---
Insights into the usage of vulnerable components and functions. __Note__: _Change_ marks changes occurred within the set timeframe.

97.title: Software components
97.query:
fetch events
| filter dt.system.bucket=="default_security_events" // only security events
| filter event.provider=="Dynatrace" // only events generated by dynatrace
| filter event.type=="VULNERABILITY_STATE_REPORT_EVENT" // historical vulnerability data
| filter event.level=="ENTITY" // on entity level
// filter only the latest snapshot data
| dedup {vulnerability.id,affected_entity.id,vulnerability.resolution.status,vulnerability.mute.status}, sort: { timestamp desc }
// end of filtering for the latest snapshot
| filter vulnerability.parent.resolution.status == $Status OR "All" == $Status
| filter vulnerability.parent.mute.status == $MuteStatus OR "All" == $MuteStatus
| filter in(vulnerability.stack,$StackLevel)
| filter in(vulnerability.parent.risk.level,$RiskLevel)
| filter vulnerability.resolution.status == "OPEN"
| filter vulnerability.mute.status == "NOT_MUTED"
| summarize
Components=countIf(isNotNull(affected_entity.vulnerable_component.id)),
by: {affected_entity.vulnerable_component.id}
| summarize
`Software components`=countIf(Components>0)

98.title: Change
98.query:
fetch events
| filter dt.system.bucket=="default_security_events" // only security events
| filter event.provider=="Dynatrace" // only events generated by dynatrace
| filter event.type=="VULNERABILITY_STATE_REPORT_EVENT" // historical vulnerability data
| filter event.level=="ENTITY" // on entity level
| filter vulnerability.parent.resolution.status == $Status OR "All" == $Status
| filter vulnerability.parent.mute.status == $MuteStatus OR "All" == $MuteStatus
| filter in(vulnerability.stack,$StackLevel)
| filter in(vulnerability.parent.risk.level,$RiskLevel)
| filter vulnerability.resolution.status == "OPEN"
| filter vulnerability.mute.status == "NOT_MUTED"
| sort timestamp, direction:"descending"
| summarize
{
affected_entity.vulnerable_component.id=takeFirst(affected_entity.vulnerable_component.id),
vulnerability.davis_assessment.vulnerable_function_status=takeFirst(vulnerability.davis_assessment.vulnerable_function_status)
},
by: {timestamp=bin(timestamp, 1h), affected_entity.id, vulnerability.display_id}
| summarize
Components=countIf(isNotNull(affected_entity.vulnerable_component.id)),
by: {timestamp, affected_entity.vulnerable_component.id}
| summarize
Components=countIf(Components>0),
by:{timestamp}
| sort timestamp, direction:"descending"
| summarize
start=takeLast(Components),
end=takeFirst(Components)
| fields delta=end-start
| fields `Components delta`=if(delta>0,concat(delta,"‚ÜóÔ∏è"),else:if(delta<0,concat(delta,"‚ÜòÔ∏è"),else:"-"))

99.title: Software component count by vulnerable functions usage status
99.query:
fetch events
| filter dt.system.bucket=="default_security_events" // only security events
| filter event.provider=="Dynatrace" // only events generated by dynatrace
| filter event.type=="VULNERABILITY_STATE_REPORT_EVENT" // historical vulnerability data
| filter event.level=="ENTITY" // on entity level
| filter vulnerability.parent.resolution.status == $Status OR "All" == $Status
| filter vulnerability.parent.mute.status == $MuteStatus OR "All" == $MuteStatus
| filter in(vulnerability.stack,$StackLevel)
| filter in(vulnerability.parent.risk.level,$RiskLevel)
| filter vulnerability.resolution.status == "OPEN"
| filter vulnerability.mute.status == "NOT_MUTED"
| filter isNotNull(affected_entity.vulnerable_component.id)
| sort timestamp, direction:"descending"
| summarize
{
affected_entity.vulnerable_component.id=takeFirst(affected_entity.vulnerable_component.id),
vulnerability.vulnerable_function_status=takeFirst(vulnerability.davis_assessment.vulnerable_function_status)
},
by: {timestamp=bin(timestamp, 1h), affected_entity.id, vulnerability.display_id}
| summarize
`In use`=countIf(vulnerability.vulnerable_function_status=="IN_USE" AND isNotNull(affected_entity.vulnerable_component.id)),
`Not in use`=countIf(vulnerability.vulnerable_function_status=="NOT_IN_USE" AND isNotNull(affected_entity.vulnerable_component.id)),
`No data`=countIf(vulnerability.vulnerable_function_status=="NOT_AVAILABLE" AND isNotNull(affected_entity.vulnerable_component.id)),
by: {timestamp, affected_entity.vulnerable_component.id}
| summarize
{`In use`=countIf(`In use`>0),
`Not in use`=countIf(`In use`==0 AND `Not in use`>0),
`Not available`=countIf(`In use`==0 AND `Not in use`==0 AND `No data`>0)},
by:{timestamp}
| sort timestamp, direction:"descending"

103.title: Vulnerable components
103.query:
fetch events
| filter dt.system.bucket=="default_security_events" // only security events
| filter event.provider=="Dynatrace" // only events generated by dynatrace
| filter event.type=="VULNERABILITY_STATE_REPORT_EVENT" // historical vulnerability data
| filter event.level=="ENTITY" // on entity level
// filter only the latest snapshot data
| dedup {vulnerability.id,affected_entity.id}, sort: { timestamp desc }
// end of filtering for the latest snapshot
| filter vulnerability.parent.resolution.status == $Status OR "All" == $Status
| filter vulnerability.parent.mute.status == $MuteStatus OR "All" == $MuteStatus
| filter in(vulnerability.stack,$StackLevel)
| filter in(vulnerability.parent.risk.level,$RiskLevel)
| filter vulnerability.resolution.status == "OPEN"
| filter vulnerability.mute.status == "NOT_MUTED"
| filter isNotNull(affected_entity.vulnerable_component.id)
//add ownership information
| lookup [
fetch dt.entity.process_group
| fieldsAdd tags
| parse toString(tags), "LD ('owner:'|'owner\\\\:') (SPACE)? LD:Team ('\"')"
], sourceField:affected_entity.id, lookupField:id, fields: {Team}
| fieldsAdd Team=if(isNotNull(Team),Team,else:"-")
// end of adding ownership info
| summarize
`# Affected entities`=arraySize(collectDistinct(affected_entity.id)),
`Component name`=takeFirst(affected_entity.vulnerable_component.name),
`# Function usages` = countIf(vulnerability.davis_assessment.vulnerable_function_status == "IN_USE"),
`# Function not in use` = countIf(vulnerability.davis_assessment.vulnerable_function_status == "NOT_IN_USE"),
`Teams`=takeFirst(Team),
by: {affected_entity.vulnerable_component.id, alias:`Component id`}
| summarize
`Component name`=takeFirst(`Component name`),
`# Affected entities`=takeFirst(`# Affected entities`),
`# Function usages`=takeFirst(`# Function usages`),
`# Function not in use`=takeFirst(`# Function not in use`),
`Teams`=collectDistinct(`Teams`),
by: {`Component id`}
| fields
dt.entity.software_component=`Component id`,
Name=`Component name`,
`Owner team`=Teams,
`Affected entities`=`# Affected entities`,
`Vulnerable functions`=if(`# Function usages`>0,concat("‚ùó","In use"),else:if(`# Function not in use`>0,"Not in use",else:"Not available"))
| sort `Vulnerable functions`, direction:"descending", `Affected entities`, direction:"descending"

111.title: Top 5 entities with vulnerable function in use
111.query:
fetch events
| filter dt.system.bucket=="default_security_events" // only security events
| filter event.provider=="Dynatrace" // only events generated by dynatrace
| filter event.type=="VULNERABILITY_STATE_REPORT_EVENT" // historical vulnerability data
| filter event.level=="ENTITY" // on entity level
// filter only the latest snapshot data
| dedup {vulnerability.id,affected_entity.id}, sort: { timestamp desc }
// end of filtering for the latest snapshot
| filter vulnerability.parent.resolution.status == $Status OR "All" == $Status
| filter vulnerability.parent.mute.status == $MuteStatus OR "All" == $MuteStatus
| filter in(vulnerability.stack,$StackLevel)
| filter in(vulnerability.parent.risk.level,$RiskLevel)
| filter vulnerability.resolution.status == "OPEN"
| filter vulnerability.mute.status == "NOT_MUTED"
| filter vulnerability.davis_assessment.vulnerable_function_status=="IN_USE"
| summarize
`Affected entity name`=takeFirst(affected_entity.name),
`Internet exposure`=takeFirst(vulnerability.davis_assessment.exposure_status),
`Reachable data assets`=takeFirst(vulnerability.davis_assessment.data_assets_status),
dt.entity.process_group=takeFirst(dt.entity.process_group),
dt.entity.host=takeFirst(dt.entity.process_group),
dt.entity.kubernetes_node=takeFirst(dt.entity.process_group),
by: {affected_entity.id}
| fields
dt.entity.process_group,
`Affected entity name`,
`Internet exposure`=if(`Internet exposure`=="PUBLIC_NETWORK",concat("‚ùó","Public network"),else:if(`Internet exposure`=="NOT_AVAILABLE","Not available", else:"Not detected")),
`Reachable data assets`=if(arraySize(toArray(`Reachable data assets`))>0,concat("‚ùó","Within range"), else:"None within range")
| sort `Internet exposure`, `Reachable data assets`, direction:"descending"
//add ownership information
| lookup [
fetch dt.entity.process_group
| fieldsAdd tags
| parse toString(tags), "LD ('owner:'|'owner\\\\:') (SPACE)? LD:Team ('\"')"
| fieldsAdd Team
], sourceField:dt.entity.process_group, lookupField:id, fields:{Team}
| sort `Internet exposure`, direction:"descending", `Reachable data assets`, direction:"descending"
| fields
dt.entity.process_group,
Name=`Affected entity name`,
`Owner team`=if(isNotNull(Team),Team,else:"-"),
`Public internet exposure`=`Internet exposure`,
`Reachable data assets`=`Reachable data assets`
| limit 5
